alert.note: Alert for Central Yampa River Basin; Lower Yampa River Basin; Roan and Tavaputs Plateaus (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 26 at 5:18PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Rio Blanco County through 545 PM MDT... At 517 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 18 miles east of Rangely, or 58 miles southwest of Craig, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Rio Blanco County. This includes Colorado 64 between mile markers 47 and 68. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Moderate to heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Central Yampa River Basin; Lower Yampa River Basin; Roan and Tavaputs Plateaus
